summary: Task A1: Fix registry.yaml naming and populate metadata for Grafana/vLLM agents. Changed 2 agent keys to kebab-case ("Grafana Agent" → "grafana-agent", "vLLM Agent" → "vllm-agent"), populated empty tools arrays with 7 and 6 tools respectively, added meaningful descriptions. All 9 validation tests passing (100%).
focus_areas: Kebab-case naming consistency across all 27 agents
